name: Slappy Ass
description:
Experience one of the most intriguing laws of physics
Slappy Ass is a sensual simulation spanking game where you play with a customizable booty. You can interact with slapping, grabbing, dragging and stripping the virtual ass. The more you experiment, the more exotic toys, panties and shapes you'll grab your hands on.

Spank your way through this simulation where you can unlock and experiment with:
  • Slapping, Grabbing, Dragging and Stripping
  • Fashionable and Sexy Outfits
  • Booty Shapes and Color Flavours
  • Challenging and competitive Minigames
  • Spicy and Kinky Toys
Test your rythm, skill and endurance with Minigames to achieve new unlockables.
